Lawmakers push for bike lane networks for frontliners, safe parking spaces tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740318 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740318/lawmakers-push-for-bike-lane-networks-for-frontliners-safe-parking-spaces/story/ Several senators are pushing for the establishment of complimentary infrastructures that would encourage the use of bicycles in the Philippines amid the COVID-19 situation. Fri, 29 May 2020 10:51:22 +0800
Virus misinformation fuels panic in Asia tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740316 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/740316/virus-misinformation-fuels-panic-in-asia/story/ In April, a hoax was shared on Facebook in the Philippines post its lockdown suggesting a motorcyclist had been shot dead for ignoring a virus checkpoint. In fact, the footage -- which was viewed tens of thousands of times in multiple posts -- was of a police training drill. Fri, 29 May 2020 10:49:19 +0800
NCR's shift to GCQ may expose thousands to COVID-19, senator says tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740314 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740314/ncr-s-shift-to-gcq-may-expose-thousands-to-covid-19-senator-says/story/ "Reading the data available to us, it seems that we have not yet flattened the curve. Instead, this easing of the lockdown may expose thousands of Metro Manila workers and residents to a new wave of community transmission that will definitely overwhelm our already-embattled health system," Senator Risa Hontiveros said in a statement. Fri, 29 May 2020 10:21:43 +0800
3 ex-rebels abducted by suspected NPA members in Samar tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740313 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/740313/3-ex-rebels-abducted-by-suspected-npa-members-in-samar/story/ Three peacebuilders were abducted by suspected New People's Army (NPA) rebels in Motiong, Samar on May 27, the military said Friday. Fri, 29 May 2020 10:07:32 +0800
1 year exemption of health workers from PhilHealth premium rate hike sought in Senate tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740312 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740312/1-year-exemption-of-health-workers-from-philhealth-premium-rate-hike-sought-in-senate/story/ Health care workers in the country must be exempted for a year from the increase of premium rate to be collected by the Philippine Health Insurance Corporation (PhilHealth) amid the COVID-19 pandemic, according to Senator Manny Pacquaio. Fri, 29 May 2020 09:56:02 +0800
Palace defends easing of NCR quarantine amid rising COVID-19 cases tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740311 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740311/palace-defends-easing-ncr-quarantine-amid-rising-covid-19-cases/story/ Malacanang on Friday defended the government's decision to ease quarantine measures in Metro Manila despite the fact that more than 60% of the COVID-19 cases recorded on May 28 are in the National Capital Region. Fri, 29 May 2020 09:51:01 +0800
Contact tracing doing good in Metro Manila -- Año tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740309 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740309/contact-tracing-doing-good-in-metro-manila-ano/story/ "In Metro Manila, there are about 150 contact tracing teams and we're doing good here in Metro Manila. I really admire the contact tracing efforts of our cities here in Metro Manila," Interior Secretary Eduardi Año said. Fri, 29 May 2020 09:24:22 +0800
Año says Leyte COVID-19 case part of Hatid Probinsiya, not Balik Probinsiya tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740308 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740308/ano-says-leyte-covid-19-case-part-of-hatid-probinsiya-not-balik-probinsiya/story/ Interior Secretary Eduardo Año on Friday clarified that the individual who tested positive for coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) in Leyte province was part of the Hatid Probinsiya program of the national government. Fri, 29 May 2020 09:16:16 +0800
Mag-amang Tsino, arestado sa sinalakay na iligal umanong botika at clinic sa Pampanga tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740307 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/740307/mag-amang-tsino-arestado-sa-sinalakay-na-iligal-umanong-botika-at-clinic-sa-pampanga/story/ Isang botika at clinic na iligal umanong pinatatakbo ng mga dayuhang Tsino ang sinalakay sa Angeles, Pampanga, ayon sa ulat ng Unang Balita nitong Biyernes. Fri, 29 May 2020 09:13:59 +0800
Senator lauds IRR on community monitoring act for subsidy payout tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740306 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740306/senator-lauds-irr-on-community-monitoring-act-for-subsidy-payout/story/ Senator Sherwin Gatchalian on Friday welcomed the signing of the implementing rules and regulation (IRR) of the community monitoring system for emergency cash aid, saying this could ensure the efficient distribution and accounting of the government subsidy. Fri, 29 May 2020 08:57:37 +0800
Dalawang suspek sa kidnap-for-ransom, patay sa engkwentro sa San Mateo tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740304 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/740304/dalawang-suspek-sa-kidnap-for-ransom-patay-sa-engkwentro-sa-san-mateo/story/ Patay ang dalawa umanong miyembro ng kidnap-for-ransom group matapos makipagbarilan daw sa otoridad sa San Mateo, Rizal, ayon sa ulat ni James Agustin sa Unang Balita nitong Biyernes. Fri, 29 May 2020 08:56:21 +0800
Gov't mulling accreditation system for barbershops amid quarantine -Palace tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740302 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740302/gov-t-mulling-accreditation-system-for-barbershops-amid-quarantine-palace/story/ The government is formulating a system of accreditation that would allow barbershops to reopen even amid the community quarantine being implemented due to the COVID-19 pandemic, presidential spokesperson Harry Roque said Friday. Fri, 29 May 2020 08:01:59 +0800
Zuckerberg distances Facebook from Twitter in Trump fight tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740301 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/740301/zuckerberg-distances-facebook-from-twitter-in-trump-fight/story/ SAN FRANCISCO --Facebook Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg took pains to distance his company from Twitter and its fight with US President Donald Trump on Thursday, as the White House moved to scrap a law protecting social media companies. Trump signs order targeting social media after tweets flagged tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740300 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/740300/trump-signs-order-targeting-social-media-after-tweets-flagged/story/ President Donald Trump signed an order Thursday seeking to strip social media giants like Twitter of legal immunity for content on their platforms in a move slammed by his critics as a legally dubious act of political revenge. Fri, 29 May 2020 07:30:40 +0800

Fri, 29 May 2020 07:28:33 +0800
